Uses of Class
online.game.gBoard

Packages that use gBoard
online.game This package contains everything a to support actual games. 
 

Uses of gBoard in online.game
 

Subclasses of gBoard in online.game
 class circBoard<CELLTYPE extends cell<CELLTYPE>>
          Base class for boards with radial symmetry.
 class hexBoard<CELLTYPE extends cell<CELLTYPE>>
          support for generic hex boards in various convex shapes, including coordinate system transforms and drawing functions.
 class rectBoard<CELLTYPE extends cell<CELLTYPE>>
          the generic part of all rectangular boards with diagonal connections
 class square_geo_board<CELLTYPE extends cell<CELLTYPE>>
          common support for square geometry boards with connections in 2 4 or 8 directions.
 class squareBoard<CELLTYPE extends cell<CELLTYPE>>
          support a square board with no diagonal links.
 class trackBoard<CELLTYPE extends cell<CELLTYPE>>
          Implement a one dimensional board with a race track around the edges, like a monopoly board.
 class triBoard<CELLTYPE extends cell<CELLTYPE>>
          support for generic triangular grid boards.
 

Methods in online.game with parameters of type gBoard
 void gBoard.clone(gBoard<CELLTYPE> from_b)
          copy from a prototype board.
 void gBoard.sameboard(gBoard<CELLTYPE> from_b)
          verify a copy of this board.
